content.p1: Petlytics is a comprehensive pet health management platform, designed by and for owners who expect more than simple vaccination reminders.
content.p2: It is a technical tool that transforms everyday observations into valuable clinical data for your veterinarian.
content.p3: Have you ever gone to a vet appointment and struggled to remember exactly when your dog’s symptoms started? Or found it hard to track your cat’s weight after a diet change? Petlytics solves this and much more by organizing your pets’ medical lives in a secure, private, and professional environment.

records.title: High-precision clinical records
records.subtitle: Don’t leave your pet’s health to memory. With Petlytics, you can record:

symptoms.d: From mild limping to changes in appetite or digestion. Add detailed notes so no nuance is lost.

weight.d: Progress charts to monitor obesity or excessive weight loss—key factors in long-term health.

photos.d: Capture photos of skin issues, eye abnormalities, or unusual behaviors so your vet can see them exactly as they occurred.

docs.d: Upload blood tests, ultrasound reports, and vaccination records. Keep your entire medical history in your pocket.

intelligence.title: Clinical intelligence at your service
intelligence.d1: Petlytics includes an advanced Smart Alerts Engine. Our algorithm analyzes the frequency and severity of recorded events.
intelligence.d2: If it detects patterns that may indicate a health risk, you’ll receive an alert suggesting it’s time to consult a professional—like having a first line of prevention active 24/7.

reports.title: PDF reports for professionals
reports.subtitle: The "Vet Bridge"
reports.d1: Our reports are designed to be genuinely useful in a veterinary setting.

unification.d: Generate a professional PDF that includes activity summaries, health statistics, and photographic evidence.

design.d: Clean, black-and-white layout for easy reading and reduced printing costs.

sharing.d: Send the complete medical history via WhatsApp, email, or any channel for emergencies or remote consultations.

privacy.title: Radical privacy: Your data is yours
privacy.subtitle: Unlike other apps, Petlytics treats health data as extremely sensitive.

storage.d: All information is stored exclusively on your device. Nothing is uploaded to external servers without your consent.

tracking.d: We don’t sell your data to pet food brands or insurers. Your experience is 100% private and ad-free.

backup.d: You decide. Export your data and store it wherever you prefer.

multipet.title: Unlimited multi-pet management
multipet.d: Have a big furry family? Manage individual profiles for each companion. Every pet has its own history, documents, and intelligent tracking.

footer.d1: When a pet isn’t feeling well, stress can make us forget important details. Petlytics acts as your clinical memory, enabling medical decisions based on facts and precise timelines—not assumptions.
footer.d2: Improve diagnosis, speed up consultations, and above all, give your companion the proactive care they deserve.
footer.note: Note: Petlytics is a support and documentation tool. It does not replace professional veterinary care.
footer.join: Join the Petlytics community and take your pet's health to the next level.
